mapper.delete:
delete from dt_article where id in (#{id})
and userId = #{userId};
mapper.select: SELECT da.id,da.title,da.content,da.type as articleType,CONCAT(da.time,'') as time,u.realName,da.status, d.name as articleTypeName FROM dt_article da JOIN tab_user u ON da.userId = u.id JOIN tab_dictionary d ON d.code = da.type and d.parentId = #{articleTypeDicId} where da.id = #{id} GROUP BY da.id limit 1
